long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Paradiso ONE is a feature-packed screen and camera recorder for Chrome. Paradiso ONE lets you annotate your screen to provide feedback, highlight important actions, edit your recordings, etc. You can either export the file as an MP4, GIF image, WebM web media, or save it directly to Google Drive Or to Paradiso ONE.
